Trinity::

She hugged Perplex. " I'm sorry.  Think we should go back now?  I'm 
not sure what to do.  I really just want my mommy and daddy back." 
she wiped her nose with her paw.  Her fur was slicked down against 
her body from the rain. She was soaked completely through.  She 
didn't even feel the chill from the wind. Her spark was feeling too 
low to notice much.
